pages.title: Prairie Rattlesnake
pages.text: Crotalus viridis ($(o)Common names: prairie rattlesnake, Great Plains rattlesnake,$()) is a venomous pit viper species native to the western United States, southwestern Canada, and northern Mexico.

pages.title: Prairie Rattlesnake
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
